tag_list: crm, online-reputation-management, web-content-development, search-engine-optimization, search-engine-marketing, corporate-branding-strategies, social-media-marketing, and-budgeting-
overview:
Aaron Helfman is the Director of Marketing and Leasing for CompassRock Real Estate. Aaron manages corporate marketing and branding strategies for CompassRock and is responsible for maximizing portfolio revenues.

Prior to joining CompassRock, Aaron was the Director of Marketing for Korman Residential Properties.

Aaron earned a Bachelor of Arts Degree from Franklin and Marshall College as a Presidential Scholar with a double major in Political Science and Judaic Studies, and graduated cum laude.

CompassRock Real Estate 555 5th Avenue, 4th Floor New York, NY 10017

degrees.subject: Double Major: Political Science and Judaic Studies
